altitude.description: This dataset describes the altitude, as elevation (metres) above sea level. This layer can be a helpful inclusion when modelling species distributions that may be limited by elevation or subsequent climatic conditions at these elevations.

precipitation_mean.description: This information is useful when examining whether species distributions are affected by mean temperature anomalies throughout particular months in the year. Good information for modelling migratory species distributions.

temperature_max.description: This information is useful when examining whether species distributions are affected by mean temperature anomalies throughout particular months in the year. Good information for modelling migratory species distributions.

temperature_min.description: This information is useful when examining whether species distributions are affected by mean temperature anomalies throughout particular months in the year. Good information for modelling migratory species distributions.

temperature_mean.description: This information is useful when examining whether species distributions are affected by mean temperature anomalies throughout particular months in the year. Good information for modelling migratory species distributions.
